results.title: Dorothy E. Smith, Groundbreaker in Feminist Sociology, Dies at 95
results.abstract: Starting in the 1960s, she sought to re-center her discipline on the experiences of women, people of color and other marginalized groups.

media.caption: Dorothy E. Smith in 2018. She argued that while conventional sociology claims to be the disinterested pursuit of objective truth, it is in fact encoded with ideologies that see the male experience as universal.
media.copyright: Francoise Mbenoun Makanda
